dao

Class ContractDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.ContractDao

  • public class ContractDao
extends java.lang.Object
    DAO class for entity Contract, contains methods for the communication with database
    Author:
    Lucas Kita

        public java.util.List<Contract> getActiveContracts()
        Send request to database for all elements of the Contract type that have element "active" set on yes
        Returns:
        list of elements of the Contract type with specified element "active" on yes

      • getContractById

        public Contract getContractById(java.lang.String id)
        Send request to database for single element of the Contract type that have specified id
        Parameters:
        id - identification number of element of the Contract type
        Returns:
        single element of the Contract type with specified id

      • updateContract

        public boolean updateContract(Contract contract)
        Update parameters of Entity Contract in database
        Parameters:
        contract - Entity Contract type to update in database
        Returns:
        true if update succeed false if not

      • idExist

        public boolean idExist(java.lang.String id)
        Search for Contract with specified id in database
        Parameters:
        id - parameter of Contract type element
        Returns:
        true if Contract with parameter id exist, false if not

      • writeContracts

        public int writeContracts(java.util.List<Contract> contractsList)
        Add list of Contract type elements to database. Checks Contract id, if exist adds a char to get a unique id number of added Contract
        Parameters:
        contractsList - list of Contract type elements to add to database
        Returns:
        number of added Contracts to database
